item.title: By: Paul Campbell
item.dc:creator: Paul Campbell
item.description: Deadly news. We really are in a powerful position, with Google, Amazon, eBay/Paypal and now Facebook. So much potential for community building.
item.content:encoded: Deadly news. We really are in a powerful position, with Google, Amazon, eBay/Paypal and now Facebook. So much potential for community building.
